message.raw:
Split conda building into a separate project, `setuptools_conda`.
This is because the code to auto build a conda package got complex enough
when it needed to take into account platform-specific dependencies (which I
realised when adapting it to zprocess), that rather than copying it into every
project it is worth being in one place.
